website_summaries.verdict: A unique sleep mask that also functions as a noise reducer – but one that also comes with a few comfort and quality concerns.
pros: Stands out for its unique design that also reduces noise by covering the ears
Velcro strap is easy to adjust
cons: Expensive, and the design is somewhat bulky
A few reports of the color fading onto pillowcases

customer_reviews.title: Product ruined by manufacturer cutting costs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product once in 2013 and once in 2017. The one I bought in 2013 was soft and pleasant to wear, but eventually I used it up (even including the light washings.) The one from late 2017 was a waste of money. The manufacturer changed the product so use newer & less breathable materials. It completely ruins any appeal that this product once had and Sleep Master is coasting by on the once high reviews of this product. Amazon should tear this product listing down and force Sleep Master to start again with 0 reviews. That would be fair to consumers, but as stands now, I've been swindled out of my money for an subpar product.
customer_reviews.author: Quest J Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT CHANGED- DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased my third(!) SleepMaster. Unfortunately the design has changed drastically. It has lost many of the features that made it great. Previously it was made of heavy silk that was comfortable and cool. It is now made of cheap synthetic fabric that is hot and makes noises (like a squeak) when you move. Unacceptable. It actually keeps you up! It is also substantially smaller providing less coverage and poor fit. The former king of sleep masks is now worse than the trash it sits upon in my garbage can. I want to cry.
customer_reviews.author: H. Jones

customer_reviews.title: BAD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this recently and the material has started fluffing and producing a lint (separating). This causes irritation and itchiness when it's on your face which is very discomforting and prevents you from sleeping as it defeats the purpose of this product. Please refer to the photos. Please advise who I can contact (provide or send me the contact details) in order to get a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Kooi

customer_reviews.title: This mask sucks for several reasons
customer_reviews.text: This mask sucks for several reasons. The first is that it fits weird- it has such a big slit in the front for the nose that lots of light gets in. It also has Velcro, which always gets stuck in my hair and rips it out. It’s satin textured, which makes it easily slip off my face and hair. Why all sleep masks aren’t black is beyond me. And the price was definitely not right... I could see paying maybe $8-9 for this fairly, not 26. Skip this one folks!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Works just wash it first...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. It's very comfy and I much prefer the Velcro over elastic straps. It bled blue crap all over my white pillow case though so you may want to wash it a couple times before use.
customer_reviews.author: daveIT

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: This has painted my whole pillow blue. I've seen similar complaints about this product. From what I understand the manufacturer change the textiles on this mask recently and it's not the same product. I'm wondering if the same blue ink that's stained my pillows is leeching into my face. Tim Ferris needs to stop recommending it.
customer_reviews.author: andrew bolger

customer_reviews.title: Too much eye pressure, slides out of place, tickly
customer_reviews.text: Cozy but moves too much when you sleep and let’s light in. Worn snuggly enough to prevent movement, it puts too much pressure on the eyes. Fibers from the mask stick out after washing and tickle your nose and face like fine little hairs. No one in my family could use it for all the same reasons. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. I work nights and needed something to help block noise and sound. This one does neither. Sounds were about the same as not wearing it and my cheap face mask from Target keeps out more light. If I wanted to wear earplugs I just would have bought them by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Parent_ of_2

customer_reviews.title: Going straight back to Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Sending back! I bought for sound reduction. As soon as I got it today put it on and tried it out. I literally could hear a pin drop on the floor. I bought this for a ten day vacation with my husband who snores very loud......this is junk and poorly made. A scarf wrapped around my head would work better and be a whole lot cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: gingblack

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat expensive, but quality is great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for my wife and thought that it's too expensive for just a mere sleep mask. I'm ok with those free ones you can get on international flights, and never bought one before. However, I have to admit that it's quality is really great. When my wife asked me to try it, I thought that it wouldn't make any difference, but, definitely, it is different. PROs: - It's very comfortable - Blinds light perfectly CONs: - A little bit too warm in summer.
customer_reviews.author: Sati219

customer_reviews.title: Not effective as a sound muffler but good sleep mask
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this product, unfortunately I was pretty disappointed. If I was only going by the description of a regular sleeping mask to block light I would rate it five starts all around, but the sound muffler isn’t effective. I know it’s not a noise blocker but for me I might as well sleep without it all, it doesn’t muffle any sound at all. With that being said it’s very comfortable and it blocks the light extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: Del

customer_reviews.title: Gets a little too hot under the mask and didn't block enough light for me.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sleep masks after doing some research. This was one of them. It's OK, but I found it got hot around my eyes during the night and I'd eventually take it off. Also, it wasn't the best for keeping out light. Eventually, I started using the other generic looking mask that I bought on Amazon and liked it a lot more. If you're interested, the other mask is the Sleep Tight Mask by G7.
customer_reviews.author: J in FLA

customer_reviews.title: Dye stains pillow cases.
customer_reviews.text: Dye stains pillow case. Washed mask to try to stop the staining and now mask is flat and feels like it has no filling.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H

customer_reviews.title: So glad I did
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews and gave it a chance. So glad I did! Best sleep I've had in probably years. I don't wake as often at night and love that light doesn't peek in. UPDATE: I bought this two years ago and it's a necessity now. I notice that when I don't wear it, I wake through the night. Coupled with some ear plugs, I sleep like a log and get to sleep quickly, which has never been the case for almost my whole life. Needless to say, this is one of my favorite products. The velcro is still holding up well, although some of the satin fabric has pulled, but nothing that a quick snip of the scissors can't fix.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Very soft & comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft & comfortable & most importantly, blocks out of light! You do have to adjust it somewhat when you put it on, but once in place, it stays put. The downside (and it’s a big one), if you have dry/irritated eyes, this mask directly contacts the eyelids & can make it worse. You might want to look for an “eye pocket” model instead.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He wakes up at 4am for work and goes to bed early. He loves this mask and says his sleep has been amazing. No light gets through at all. One evening we lost power and he went to bed. It came back on at 10:30 pm but he was already asleep. The lights next to the bed came on but didn’t disturb him at all. I am ordering a second one for my son.
customer_reviews.author: JYu411

customer_reviews.title: Works but bleeds
customer_reviews.text: The blue dye is all over my pillow nightly. I have washed many times & it still fades on the pillow. Otherwise, I like the fit & it works well if they get this bleeding issue solved.
customer_reviews.author: L. Browning

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: After some time ,the inner surface get very uncomfortable. It itch your eyes alltime when wear it.
customer_reviews.author: weiming chen

customer_reviews.title: doesn't block out any sound like it claims too
customer_reviews.text: Its comfy but its allot of mask, doesn't block out any sound like it claims too. Can slip off if you toss and turn. THIS MASK WILL STAIN LIGHT COLORED SHEETS due to oil/sweat from skin transfering dye. I use an old pillowcase with it.
customer_reviews.author: Data

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone down
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brand sleep mask for several years and loved it. Unfortunately I accidentally left it at a hotel and had to order a new one. I’m sad to say that the quality isn’t the same. It has less Velcro, the internal materials seem cheaper. Frankly I’m disappointed. I believe the price point is lower than what I originally paid but I would have been willing to pay more for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't reduce sound AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: Manufacturer must agree it does not reduce sound because they include a pair of earplugs. Ridiculous. Sound reduction was main reason I purchased. Very regrettable purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Yourdan

customer_reviews.title: Stained my skin and pillow.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy this after reading Tim Feriss’ high recommendation. While it was comfortable, it didn’t breathe very well and caused me to sweat. The dye in the material bled and I ended up with blue skin and blue stains on my pillow case. I gave it several more tries and it kept happening. I ended up throwing it away since it caused more problems than it solved.
customer_reviews.author: Long-time customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed product that hurts your sleep
customer_reviews.text: This masks closes with velcro on the back, which pushes into the back of my head and makes me feel uncomfortable when I sleep. I often wake up finding that I took it off while sleeping without even realizing it. It is very hot since it doesn't breathe at all, which adds to the discomfort. Finally, it doesn't dampen then sound at all, instead it just warms up my ears and pushed them closer to my head for yet more discomfort. The complimentary sleeping masks I get when I fly do a better job than this mask. I wish I could return this poorly designed product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, but color bleeds onto pillowcase and bedding
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask after seeing many recommendations, and while it feels very comfortable and helped me fall asleep quickly, I had to stop using it because your facial oils soak into the mask and the blue color bleeds onto your pillowcase and sheets. We've tried spot removers and washing with bleach, but the blue smears will not come out. Due to this I cannot recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a mask with superior coverage and comfort, but found neither. For me, I had issues with light leakage by the nose, the mask kept slipping and not staying on properly, and when I made it tight enough it gave me a headache. I'm looking to upgrade from a cheap elastic type mask, but this felt like a downgrade. I can't review sound dampening, because I don't care about that. But I'm back to shopping for a mask upgrade. Two stars because the fabric quality is nice and giving the benefit of the doubt that perhaps if I had a different head/face shape, it would fit better. -3 stars for the rest of the experience.
customer_reviews.author: dk

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mask. Since it wraps around your head it really blocks out the light. I love that you can adjust the tightness. I have used other masks before, and they always left a mark on your face. I haven't had any issues with this one. I love that it's easy to wash. I usually wash it with jeans so the Velcro doesn't stick to my other clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: A little warm but does the job
customer_reviews.text: The mask is for sure soft and the material blocks light. I'll admit that it doesn't fit perfectly in the cutout for the nose tends to flare up there for allowing light in through the bottom. as well it's a warmer material and therefore in the summer months I would often get sweaty from the mask. Most nights I would actually wake up in the middle of the night or the morning with the mask off assuming I probably took it off in my sleep because it was warm. To help myself fall back asleep I put the mask back on. It does the job though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Groome

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase - Sound and Light Protection
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one i bought. My first one got a little dirty from makeup residue (I know - sounds yucky) - so I ordered a fresh one. This design is simple, comfy and gets the job done. I like how it covers the ears to create both light AND sound barrier. It feels very cozy. The velco stays in place and doesn't squeeze like elastic ones - you adjust to your own comfort. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Notmartha

customer_reviews.title: Glorified Bandanna
customer_reviews.text: It was comfortable, soft, and blocked light...the first week. After that, waste of money. Stretched easily, didn’t keep light out, small strip of Velcro doesn’t hold, Velcro strap in back is uncomfortable for back sleepers. I bought another brand after a month. Someone could easily make/sew this on their own.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bevilacqua

customer_reviews.title: Best nights sleep.
customer_reviews.text: The first night I wore the mask, it fell off. I tightened it better (still comfortable) and it has stayed on since. I wear my hair up and haven’t tried with my hair down. It blocks the light and doesn’t pull on your hair or ears as other masks have. I don’t notice it and it isn’t a bother. I had the best nights sleep in this mask! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Turner

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Sleep Mask
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 2.5 years ago and still wear it proudly (ok, maybe not proudly, I certainly wish I weren't annoyingly sensitive to light in the morning!). Now I have three (home, vacation place, travel bag). Really soft, comports to your face, and washes well. Some review mentioned getting warm, and I have not found that. There is the smallest light protrusion of any sleep mask out there. You will not be sorry you bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Bullion

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and really blocks light.
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and best looking mask I’ve tried. Wish it came in other colors for sure. Stains easily, even tears or moisture from eyes stain the inside. Doesn’t block much noise, you still need ear plugs for sure. But blocks light really ell.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hoxsey

customer_reviews.title: It's far more comfortable than a traditional eye mask
customer_reviews.text: It's far more comfortable than a traditional eye mask. Totally blocks out light and covers your ears (doesn't block out sound really.) If you have long hair in the back, probably not the best option, but works great for me!
customer_reviews.author: Adam B

customer_reviews.title: Great Mask - Unfortunately I Found It Hard To Get Comfortable In It
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the package it turned up in, with a minimalist approach. The mask was exactly as described and did what it said. For me however I really couldn't get used to the way the mask touched my eyelashes and that made it very difficult to use, I also didn't like the feel of the smooth material. My wife started using it however and she found it the perfect mask to help her go to sleep when I was sitting in bed reading with the light on. She would remove it once it was lights out. I would recommend the mask but be aware of the way the mask hugs your eyes as well as your head :)
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Cocker

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. No light gets through
customer_reviews.text: Soft. Comfortable. No light gets through. Washable, but after I'd say a year I you'll want another one. It will either be stained from not washing regularly or faded/beat up from washing basically weekly. Works great tho. And whether it's stained or faded or whatever it still blocks light and is comfortable as when brand new... so if u don't care how it looks after a year it's still fully functional if u want to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: ABookAway

customer_reviews.title: I bought this because it is recommended by Ben Greenfield
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it is recommended by Ben Greenfield. I was expecting better quality for the price. And the ear plug component they mention.....well they just send earplugs with it!! Not really what I was expecting. It covers the eyes, so that is what I needed. I just think I could've gotten a better deal somewhere else. Last time I take the suggestion off of Ben Greenfields web site, I'm sure he got a kick back for this. (my bad!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to imagine a worse sleep mask. The straps that cover the ears rustle loudly at every movement no matter how small, the mask sits directly on the eyes, and the cut for the nose lets in light. I’m stuck with it so I’m trying to use it but I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Have used for a year. All good.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use with a full face CPAP mask. It’s been outstanding. Was worried that the fabric would be a little see-through, would stretch out over time or would loose it’s stitching. None have happened aside from a little pilling. So good in fact that I’m ordering another pair in case these are no longer available in a few years (which i doubt).
customer_reviews.author: Thales2112

customer_reviews.title: Hot!
customer_reviews.text: This mask fit me well, although it would not seal on my face. That is to say, I could always look down my nose and see the light, as it were. But that isn't the big problem. The problem, for me anyway, is heat retention. The mask is big. Encompassing. A full wraparound. It keeps light out and it muffles sound. But to do so, it covers so much real estate without ventilation that it becomes uncomfortably warm. If you get cold easily, this mask might be for you. But it's not for me. It works on my big face and head, which most masks do not, but I just can't wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Suspect

customer_reviews.title: I love it because I covers the ears
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping mask is a dream, is incredibly soft and it will blanket the entire face which gives you a feeling that being isolated and it is night. I love it because I covers the ears, I really can't stand the elastic band around my head, they are very uncomfortable. This is by far the best mask sleep in the market, it's also perfect for long flights, I really recommend it. It also brought a couple of basics earplugs as a gift, which is appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is comfortable and great for blocking light
customer_reviews.text: This is comfortable and great for blocking light. Please note the the mask itself does not block sound though! There are earplugs included, but i was really hoping to not need them since i find earplugs uncomfortable. But five stars for the purpose of blocking light and being comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: Its great if you sleep on your back. As an occasional side sleeper I find myself taking it off at night because it gets scrunched up on the side of my face that's on the pillow. Other than that it blocks out light really well, is really comfortable when you're on your back and I like that it goes over your ears and the strap is really wide. Also this mask does not block ANY noise so don't be fooled by that and if i sleep on my side the ear that I'm sleeping on hurts in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: John Barry

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep mask hands down!
customer_reviews.text: I read about this mask on Tim Ferriss or Bulletproof executive. I don't remember which deserves the credit because I get newsletters from both. What I do know is that it was the best purchase advise ever. I have bought 3 or 4 sleep masks in the past and always end up wearing them for 15 minutes and taking them off. This mask is incredibly comfortable and you can sleep in any position. Wore it all night!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Good sleep
customer_reviews.text: A little hot but not too bad. Very quiet and dark. There is Velcro at the back and that may bother some people but for me it’s much better than the elastic used in may last eyeshade.
customer_reviews.author: Tropic Bay

customer_reviews.title: The Best Sleep Mask Available
customer_reviews.text: I fly a lot, usually the early ones. This mask has been amazing. But you might say, "$25+ for a SLEEP MASK? ARE YOU CRAZY?" Yes, I am; Crazy about sleeping well. While other sleep masks rely on elastic bands to keep it in place, this one covers your eyes and stay secure by velcro. If you want great sleep with the aid of a mask, this is the one. Note: I lost my first one on the eve of a transpacific overnight flight. I had this one delivered express.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gone through a lot of sleep masks but this ones been the best. Thought it would be bulky but it’s not, was very surprised with how comfortable it was a. I would like the satin to have a higher quality but great anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Great Gifts
customer_reviews.text: My Wife loves it and can wear it through the night. I previously purchased the Tempurpedic model thinking it was the best, but it doesn't work well if you are a side sleeper. Also the Tempurpedic model applies pressure on your nasal cavities which can be uncomfortable. The Tempurpedic model might block out more light, but the sleep master is more comfortable and now that my wife has both, she hasn't used the tempurpedic model. Strap is durable. This will last much longer than other sleep masks.
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very hard time with most sleep masks as I have a problem with my nose due to a car accident. They tend to put too much pressure on the nose and I cannot breathe. If I lose them up, they slide off. This one however, is fantastic. I put it on loose and it doesn't slide. Stays in place all night. Added bonus, its satin, so it won't damage the hair. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing masks for many years. This is the first time I've been inspired to write a review, however. It covers the eyes -- as they all do -- but this one is satin-soft -- unlike any other I've used previously. It's "wide" and continues over the ears and has Velcro on the back which...for me...holds my hair down and eliminates bed-head. It serves the purpose of a satin pillow case, without the pillowcase. A plus I'd never considered previously! Anyway...what can you say about a mask other than I really really like it. It does its job with some additional benefits, as mentioned. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C. C. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: HOT on my face
customer_reviews.text: Terrible for me, it gets HOT. I wake up literally sweating! Get the 3-d face mask that doesn't smush your eyes down
customer_reviews.author: Kim S.

customer_reviews.title: Only sleep mask I can tolerate
customer_reviews.text: This is the only sleep mask I have ever tolerated. I have purchased 4 over the past couple of years. My only complaint is the satin fabric wears out, hence the several purchases.
customer_reviews.author: C. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Tim Ferriss Effect got me... But it's great!
customer_reviews.text: I love sleeping with this. Fall asleep easier and faster. It's the perfect companion for travel in bright hotels with poor window coverings. I sleep like a baby with this.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Works Like A Charm!
customer_reviews.text: I am a picky sleeper, there's no pretending otherwise. One of my conditions to fall asleep is needing a sleep mask for pitch black. As such, many sleep masks are incapable of blocking out enough light. I have to fall asleep with sound, so I fall asleep with my TV on. Therefore, my sleep masks have to be able to block out light effectively. I bought a sleep mask I loved, and that worked well, but it leeched dye onto my pillow and sheets no matter how many times I washed it. So, I tried again, and though this sleep mask is far from attractive it's comfortable, effective, and I slept like a dream in it!
customer_reviews.author: CamilleElise

customer_reviews.title: Such a great product, I can’t sleep without it.
customer_reviews.text: A great product! Every now and then our dog will get a hold of it and I will have to order a new one, but I do it every time because I cannot sleep without it! It blocks out sounds as well as lights and doesn’t mash down with an elastic band. I hardly feel it there when it’s on but I definitely notice a difference in sleep when I don’t have it.
customer_reviews.author: WHR V

customer_reviews.title: What a great sleep mask!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Really didn’t expect to receive such a great product given its affordable price. But the touch is very soft, you can tell it’s made from good material and I had a very good sleep wearing it last night! 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hu

customer_reviews.title: It's very good quality. Made of satin material
customer_reviews.text: It's very good quality. Made of satin material. My only complaint is the size. This this is huge. It wraps around your whole head and it's kind of thick. I was looking for something to cover just my eyes...not my eyes, cheeks, ears and the back of my head. But if you are looking for 100% blackout this is your best bet. The velcro is adjustable. But i have a fairly large head and its almost too big on me. So probably not good for small heads.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Bahnick

customer_reviews.title: If you are a "hot sleeper" maybe not.
customer_reviews.text: Great construction and great idea, I get hot when I sleep and could not tolerate the wrap around fabric. I prefer the Alaskan Bear sleep mask, it is soft on the face and just a strap to hold it on.
customer_reviews.author: Alpine Hiker

customer_reviews.title: I like the satin finish but it still moves around my face
customer_reviews.text: I have been using eye masks for years now and I saw this and decided to try it out to see if it blocked out more light. It's really large and covers most of my head, but the velcro is generous and you can adjust it easily to fit your head. I also put it in the washing machine when it got smelly and it came out great, no problems. It isn't migrate-proof though its better than those cheapie eye masks you get from the store. Blocks out light very well and I like the satin finish. It doesn't leave marks on my face (although my cotton pillowcase does). It seems really durable and long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: C. PinchonTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask!!! I've been trying to find a sleep mask that really works for me. I found another type that was light weight and did a good job, but, being a migraine sufferer, found that the strap on the back would slide and cause a pressure point at the base of my skull and trigger headaches. So when I saw this one I thought it was worth a try. I LOVE it. It's so soft on my head and really blocks the light, and it doesn't cause any pressure points for me. I'm ordering another so I have a backup!
customer_reviews.author: MKL

customer_reviews.title: Completely blocks out light
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft and silky it is and it completely blocks out light. However it wasn’t as noise-cancelling as I had hoped and it is larger so it makes my face very warm. Although some people may want that. Overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy to Sleep In!
customer_reviews.text: It is soft, keeps the light out, covers my ears and due to its size, it is easy to find in the dark before the morning light peeks through. It feels great in the summer and winter!
customer_reviews.author: Gray

customer_reviews.title: love this!
customer_reviews.text: love this!!! My husband can't fall asleep unless the T.V. is on and I can't sleep with it on. The mask blocks ALL of the annoying light and flashing. I sleep, he sleeps. Sound is muffled with out the ear plugs, enough that I am not bothered by it and i have not had a problem with my hair tangling in it at all (my hair is long thick and curly). Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Gerri Sue

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: You pay for what you get. Great sleep mask. Very comfortable and good fit. No light sneaks in. Folds up easily. Can sleep on my stomach and it's still very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: jpn

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep mask I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Keeping this review short and sweet, this is the best sleep mask I've ever owned. I absolutely love the full 360 degree coverage. There is a TINY amount of light leak, but so much better than any sleep mask I've ever used - by a huge margin. It's not quite as good as full blown blackout curtains, but its pretty darn close (and, of course, at a fraction of the cost).
customer_reviews.author: Israel Unger

customer_reviews.title: It really does work
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive when I saw this but I figured I would try it, I use a CPAP machine and always have a problem covering the face mask, this really does work and keeps the light out. I am very happy with this mask, it is very light, comfortable and I will purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tom P.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised... but wash it first a couple of times!
customer_reviews.text: This product is lightweight, comfortable, blocks out all light, and even blocks out a decent amount of sound. It also bled blue dye all over my pillow cases. Wash the product first a couple of times before using it (it requires cold water hand washing and drop-drying). I don't know if the dye comes out of non-bleachable pillow cases yet... it would make me sad if it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible sleeping mask
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of a recommendation from Tim Ferriss. The first thing I noticed is how uncomfortable the fabric is. After buying it, I read through the other reviews and realized the company changed the fabric from the version that was recommended. Also, the velcro strap is very cheap and doesn't stick well. On top of that, the mask easily slides off your face when you put your head on a pillow. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfy & good material
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, wonderful material and keeps light out. But slips off easily would be my only complaint. Otherwise very comfortable and good product.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Mask does not block out noise.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item with the intent to use it for blocking out sound. When the mask arrived it included ear plugs to put in my ear. When I read the advertisement for the mask, it sounded like the mask had built into something to block the noise. I am very disappointed. I already have many different kinds of ear plugs. I believe the information on the mask is not clear for the blocking if noise.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: Novelty value only
customer_reviews.text: For the first month, I loved this sleep mask. Maybe you will still love it, but I've gone back to my original eye mask. After a month of use, I found it either too tight or too loose, and re-adjusting the velcro in the night woke my wife up. The worst experience was when it was too tight - pressing on my eyes all night gave me an enormous stye (a spot) under my eyelid the next day! Also the wrap-around sleep mask gets sweaty so you have to wash it, which will limit its lifespan.
customer_reviews.author: ACyclic

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for several months now and I can not sleep without it!! It's very soft and comfortable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: The best sleep mask
customer_reviews.text: The best sleep mask there is. Fits well and isn't too bulky around your head, so it doesn't disturb sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Thorburn

customer_reviews.title: light weight and comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: Soft, light weight and comfortable.... But- too slippery. It's silk all the way around and it slips around my head. I'd give it 2.5 because it does a good job blocking light when it stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The blue from the fabric came off on my pillows.
customer_reviews.author: m Bar

customer_reviews.title: Filler used over the ears is loud
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the worst sleep masks I've ever had. It goes over your ears but the fabric that is inside as the filler, is LOUD. It crinkles all night, I mean ALL NIGHT... it does block out the sun, and is comfortable, but it constantly woke me up with the crinkling over my ears. I've thought of maybe sewing some flannel fabric on the inside to decrease the sound, maybe I'll do that when I pick up sewing :P haha
customer_reviews.author: Ambar

customer_reviews.title: The best sleep mask I've used.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best sleep masks I've ever used. It generally stays in place even though I tend to roll around a lot while I sleep. My chief complaint is that it bled blue dye all over my white pillowcases. Thankfully the color came out of my sheets and after washing the mask, it hasn't continued to bleed color.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Berkeley

customer_reviews.title: Falls off
customer_reviews.text: This kept falling off and didnt block out any more sound than a thick feather tick.
customer_reviews.author: PMS

customer_reviews.title: WARNING-STAINS SHEETS/BEDDING/EVERYTHING!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband, he really likes it. BUT, it leaves dye all over the sheets/pj's/bedding. Have sent email asking how to get stains out - NOTHING! Have sent Facebook message - NOTHING! Their customer service is nonexistent. I would NOT recommend this product in the dark blue dye, unless that is the color of your bedding/etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. F.

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 different sleeping masks to find the best one and his was second to last. Believe the reviews about your eyes touching the fabric, it does not promote REM sleep and is uncomfortable. The "over the ear" design is great, in theory, but just put a T-shirt over your ear and see if that blocks sound = doesn't really do anything. If you're serious about finding one, get one that has room for you eyes to move while you sleep and something around the bridge of your nose so no light gets in.
customer_reviews.author: T Kor

customer_reviews.title: like once every 7-10 days minimum
customer_reviews.text: The material is soft and is not uncomfortable. However, this is definitely not revolutionary and does *not* block out all light. The material is thicker than a cheapo mask, but if you open your eyes with the mask on you can still see light through the material. Draping a t-shirt over my eyes is more efficient. The material also absorbs a lot of oil from your face. Expect to wash it frequently, like once every 7-10 days minimum. Not completely garbage, but not revolutionary either.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Sherman

customer_reviews.title: COLOR BLEEDS & Not great to begin with
customer_reviews.text: To puffy to be effective for blocking light. Feels good, soft., but doesn’t get the job done and ruins pillow cases 😑
customer_reviews.author: emily calderwood

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty skeptical when I purchased this since it covers your ears and wraps all the way around your face but it's honestly worked really well
customer_reviews.author: Michael Flaherty

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be a very durable product, which ...
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a very durable product, which is why I bought it. But to put it on tight enough to stay on for me, there is a lot of pressure on the eyes, and it is very hot for me.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Sleep master sleep mask
customer_reviews.text: my partner is very sensitive to light in the bedroom, whereas i like to have sunshine in the morning to wake up to. this mask proved a great solution to both our problems: he can sleep in, i can wake up with daylight. my partner had tried other sleeping masks and none were comfortable enough to wear for prolonged periods of time. he doesn't sleep with this on all night, but it's comfortable for many hours. the only draw back is the loudness of the velcro, which wakes me up--but there's an easy fix for that: he opens it before i go to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: morningtea

customer_reviews.title: Not like the picture.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like the picture. But they do work. And I have had it for about 2 years. I really wish it was like the picture. That is the only thing.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY recommended.  Nothing else available comes close (trust me, I'm an insomniac!)
customer_reviews.text: Soft and breathable, and it completely covers my eyes and ears! I've used some form of sleep mask for decades, but *this* is the one I have been waiting for: I have several of these now, so that I can give them a nice gentle wash in rotation.
customer_reviews.author: Labrat (Spero meliora)

customer_reviews.title: The best sleep mask out there! Trust me!
customer_reviews.text: I wear this sleep mask every night! THank you for fast shipping and a very quality item. I have never used a sleep mask that blocks out the light so well and is so comfortable! I can't sleep without it! I own about 5 or 6 sleep masks and have always had trouble balancing out comfort with light blocking ability. I've been through tons of Amazon reviews and I'm happy I finally landed on the best one that blocks light and is incredibly comfortable. I would wear the mask during the day if I could!! I will never buy any other mask and I recommend this one to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonRx

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I like that it works well for side sleepers but the mask doesn't do a great job of blocking out light and does a terrible job of blocking out noise. It actually adds noise because you hear the mask rustling on your ears. It's also quite uncomfortable because there is no elastic. You either get it tight enough to stay on (very uncomfortable on face and ears) or it's loose enough to feel good but doesn't block any light. Very poor product.
customer_reviews.author: Astrid

customer_reviews.title: Its ok but not as good as i expected
customer_reviews.text: Its ok but not as good as i expected.,the material is not 100% light proof i can still see light when wearing it. If i wear a normal mask under these its totaly dark but if i have to wear two masks to totaly blocl light i cant fully recommend them. Also im not crazy about it hugging my ears as it starts to get uncomfortable after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Ori Teper

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a noise muffling sleep mask and found another brand similar to this for twice the price. This product covers well and is adjustable with the velcro. It is not as quiet as I'd hope but the package included ear plugs if you choose to wear them. The material is very soft and I love that you are able to wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 9 months ago and love it. I have tried other masks because they were less expensive. I felt this mask was pricey. However, the other masks all eventually bothered me. The would scratch my face, make me sweat, pull my hair, not keep the light out, etc. This mask stays in place and keeps the light out but the best part is that it is gentle on your skin. I love it. It is definitely worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I love this. I have been looking for a good sleep mask to block light and muffled some sound. I have tried several but this is the only one that does this and is truly comfortable. I am a back sleeper and this is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kelven

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Good Quality.
customer_reviews.text: This mask is very comfortable, provides adequate circumference around the head with room to spare, does a good job with blocking light out, and works well over my CPAP mask. We plan to buy another, as we liked the product so much.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortable and covers more of my face than cheap masks ...
customer_reviews.text: My significant other stays up later than I do, so I wear this a lot to block his reading/screen light. It's comfortable and covers more of my face than cheap masks do, so light doesn't sneak in around my nose. Also, I have long hair and it never tangles in this velcro.
customer_reviews.author: MiniMogur

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep mask
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't write reviews, but this is the best sleep mask I've ever bought! So quality and comfortable! I researched all the masks on amazon aand this is the only one not made in China..
customer_reviews.author: PixieBrat

customer_reviews.title: most comfortable mask ever
customer_reviews.text: Because there is a light outside of my window, I need an eye mask to help me to sleep. I tried other eye masks before, most of them are too hard. Only one is just ok but it's fade. So I just do a small research on amazon and find this mask has a high rating. Then I just bought one, I didn't expect it will be that good before I get the real thing. Yes, it's very soft, and the silky silk material makes me feel like i'm not wearing anything when i'm sleeping. I will absolutely recommend this eye mask to any of my friend if they need one.
customer_reviews.author: joyce

customer_reviews.title: Loved the quality and wearing comfort
customer_reviews.text: I am very light sleeper, whenever I have light on my room I just cant sleep well. In addition, I have a alot of sleeping problem during travelling as I have no control on room or the place that I would sleep in. I had tried many sleeping masks & goggles but none of them where comfortable. After reading reviews about this item I deciede to invest in it and try it out. I liked that the size that you control it your self, the fabric has a feeling of silk, and it covers your ears as well (I tend to cover my ears with hands sometimes). It worth the investment and very much comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: adel

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again, item actually shipped in 1 day! great service & product
customer_reviews.text: I'm a college student whose room mate is less than ideal. I have to go to work at 6am M-F and he usually doesn't come in the small (less than 400sq ft) room until about 2am. After coming in, he usually eats, makes noise, "studies," and what not. Needless to say, he deprives me of some much needed sleep. This sleep mask is a sanity saver, I use it every night! Seller is great; the product came in the mail the next day. The mask comes with earplugs which is a plus. 5 star product/seller would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's so BIG!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I love this sleep mask and it's really comfortable, but I promise you that once you put this sleep mask on your face and roll over to kiss your wife or husband good night they will most certainly burst out laughing hysterically. At least my wife did which led to countless jokes in bed that night regarding the size of the mask and the satiny fabric that it's made of. If you want a comfortable night sleep and a goodnight laugh then buy this sleep mask!
customer_reviews.author: Will Pisnieski

customer_reviews.title: A LOT bigger than I was expecting...
customer_reviews.text: I gotta say, I was a bit surprised by the size of this sleep mask. I don't have a particularly small face (normal sized, I would say) and it extends far up my forehead and down my cheekbone. A bit more than it shows in the picture. That being said, the material does seem like it may be cool. Maybe I haven't given it a fair chance yet, but I can say I just haven't used it too much, preferring my old one, since it seemed to get a bit hot.
customer_reviews.author: JLB

product_meta.title: Sleep Master Sleep Mask
product_meta.description: LOOK NO FURTHER! You've found the BEST sleep mask on the market. Hundreds of thousands sold with a more than 99.99% customer approval rating! CRITICALLY ACCLAIMED! The Revolutionary Product: After extensive research, the inventor of SLEEP MASTER(an insomnia sufferer) couldn't find a sleep mask that combined the conditions necessary for deep sleep: light elimination and sound reduction. Traditional sleep masks didn't fit or last. They all had thin elastic straps that shift uncomfortably during sleep, fray apart quickly or simply snap off after only a few uses, never mind the disastrous results from washing them! Thus was born SLEEP MASTER utilizing a soft, cool satin fabric, that is comfortable, LIGHT WEIGHT AND BREATHABLE, FLEXIBLE, DURABLE, wide and easily connected in the back by Velcro. The ear area is padded for sound muffling. It stretches or constricts for the fit you desire. SLEEP MASTER is a simple, all-in-one, one-size-fits-all product, which ELIMINATES LIGHT and REDUCES SOUND, giving you a deep, refreshing sleep by shutting out the world in an immediate, intimate way. ~~Normal use MUFFLES SOUND significantly, providing a sense of separation from ambient activity and noise, but not complete isolation. For total sound elimination, you may choose to insert the top quality ear plugs (provided with the mask) before placing SLEEP MASTER around your head, which will block out sound completely & hold the ear plugs securely in place. CPAP users report that SLEEP MASTER fits comfortably when used with a CPAP! Superior quality materials and construction, along with washability, make SLEEP MASTER a far superior value than other masks: It is much more hygienic & lasts many times longer than other masks on the market. If for any reason you are not satisfied with SLEEP MASTER.
feature_bullets: Fully adjustable, light-weight and breathable cool satin sleep mask
Durable, soft, flexible and wide to surround your head comfortably, connects easily in the back with velcro strips
No Latex, Hypoallergenic and Hand Washable

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
